title: (x) ID - Bold semi-cursive sans? - Tarzana Wide Bold {Jan}
content:
I came upon this nice typeface and, as usual, WhatTheFont was useless. Anybody know what it is? I really like the a, c and d.

thanks all,  
:D

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820102711im_/http:/typophile.com/files/socially_engaged_buddhism_3700.png)
author: sdaris

comments.content: Wow - an id in 20 minutes! Thanks, Jan.
